name: E.T. 3D
description:
Controls:

Move - WASD / Arrow Keys

Space Bar - Levitate

Collect all 3 phone pieces and get to your spaceship without getting caught by the SWAT member. You can lose him by levitating above the trees. Eat radioactive Reese's Pieces to restore your energy to levitate some more. Try to get a good time!

It's a remake of the world's worst game, E.T the Extra-Terrestrial for Atari. Interested to see how it made? Check out the devlog here:

Also feel free to check out my YouTube channel for more videos and games:

https://www.youtube.com/TylerGreen
